name: Healer's Hut
description: A small thatched cottage filled with drying herbs and the scent of remedies.

levels.description: Bundles of herbs hang from the ceiling while Miriam works at a worn wooden table preparing remedies.
Miriam has reorganized her workspace with your help. Her collection of remedies has expanded, and she now has a dedicated area for patients.

levelUpEncounter.name: Rare Herb Expedition
levelUpEncounter.description: Miriam needs help obtaining a rare herb from the deep forest.

name: Meditation Chamber
description: A quiet, dimly lit room where monks practice meditation and contemplation.

levels.description: Stone walls and a few scattered cushions create an atmosphere of peaceful solitude, with Brother Thomas quietly guiding practitioners.
Your regular visits have earned you a dedicated space in the chamber. Brother Thomas now offers you more advanced techniques.

levelUpEncounter.name: Ancient Meditation Technique
levelUpEncounter.description: Brother Thomas offers to teach you a rare meditation technique passed down through generations.

name: Tavern Common Room
description: The warm, bustling heart of the tavern where patrons gather for drinks and entertainment.

levels.description: A crackling fireplace, wooden tables worn smooth from years of use, and the constant hum of conversation fill this welcoming space.
Your performances have made you a familiar face in the tavern. Patrons often request your stories or songs when you enter.

levelUpEncounter.name: Traveling Bard Competition
levelUpEncounter.description: A famous traveling bard has come to town and challenges local performers to a friendly contest.

name: Market Square
description: A lively open area where merchants set up stalls and villagers gather to trade goods.

levels.description: Colorful awnings shade merchants' wares as they call out to passing customers. The air is filled with the scents of fresh bread, spices, and livestock.
Your trading activities have earned you respect among the merchants. Some now reserve their best goods for you and offer better prices.

levelUpEncounter.name: Merchant Guild Invitation
levelUpEncounter.description: Your trading success has caught the attention of the regional merchant guild.

name: Village Blacksmith
description: A sweltering forge where the village blacksmith and his apprentice craft metal goods.

levels.description: The rhythmic clanging of hammer on anvil fills the air as Emil works under the watchful eye of Master Osgar. Heat radiates from the glowing forge.
Emil has grown more confident with your help. Master Osgar now lets him work on more complex projects and occasionally nods approvingly at your assistance.

levelUpEncounter.name: Special Commission
levelUpEncounter.description: Master Osgar has received a prestigious commission and needs additional help.

name: Guard Training Yard
description: An open area near the village wall where the guards practice combat techniques.

levels.description: Weapon racks line one wall, while training dummies bear the scars of countless practice strikes. Captain Aldric oversees the morning drills with stern efficiency.
Your dedication has impressed Captain Aldric. He now includes you in advanced drills and occasionally asks for your input on training methods.

levelUpEncounter.name: Village Defense Test
levelUpEncounter.description: Captain Aldric wants to test the guards' readiness with a surprise drill.

name: Hunter's Camp
description: A small clearing in the forest where Rowan the hunter makes his temporary camp.

levels.description: A simple lean-to shelter, small fire pit, and several stretched animal hides mark this as Rowan's domain. Various tracking and hunting tools are meticulously organized nearby.
Rowan has expanded his camp to accommodate your frequent visits. He's set aside a space for you to practice tracking skills and keeps a spare bow on hand.

levelUpEncounter.name: Track Mysterious Beast
levelUpEncounter.description: Rowan has found unusual tracks and wants your help identifying the creature.

name: Monastery Library
description: A quiet, dust-filled room lined with shelves of ancient texts and scrolls.

levels.description: Narrow windows cast beams of light across worn wooden tables where Brother Elias carefully tends to the monastery's collection of knowledge.
Brother Elias now grants you access to the more restricted sections of the library. He's begun to consult you on particularly difficult translations.

levelUpEncounter.name: Mysterious Manuscript
levelUpEncounter.description: Brother Elias has discovered an unusual manuscript that defies conventional translation methods.

name: Market Judge's Stand
description: A small raised platform where the village elder resolves market disputes.

levels.description: A simple wooden podium stands empty most days, but becomes the center of attention when disputes arise. Elder Matilda occasionally seeks assistance from trusted villagers.
Your fair judgments have earned you respect. Elder Matilda now directly refers certain disputes to you and values your counsel on more complex matters.

levelUpEncounter.name: Major Merchant Conflict
levelUpEncounter.description: A serious dispute between two influential merchant families threatens village harmony.

name: Tavern Shadowy Corner
description: A dimly lit alcove perfect for observing the tavern's patrons without drawing attention.

levels.description: Partially hidden by a support beam and perpetually in shadow, this corner table offers an ideal vantage point to watch and listen to the tavern's many conversations.
You've become so familiar with this spot that the tavern staff rarely notice your presence. Regular patrons unknowingly speak freely around you.

levelUpEncounter.name: Mysterious Stranger
levelUpEncounter.description: A cloaked figure notices your information gathering and offers a proposition.
